00001 #include "Framework/ParameterSet.h"
00002 #include "Framework/Exception.h"

00005 
00006     void ParameterSet::insert(const std::string& name, int value) {
00007         elements_[name] = Element(value);
00008     }
00009 
00010     int ParameterSet::getInteger(const std::string& name) const {
00011         std::map<std::string, Element>::const_iterator ptr = elements_.find(name);
00012         if (ptr == elements_.end()) {
00013             EXCEPTION_RAISE("ParameterNotFound", "Integer parameter '" + name + "' not found");
00014         }
00015         if (ptr->second.et_ != et_Integer) {
00016             EXCEPTION_RAISE("ParameterTypeError", "Parameter '" + name + "' is not an integer");
00017         }
00018         return ptr->second.intval_;
00019     }
00020 
00021     int ParameterSet::getInteger(const std::string& name, int defaultValue) const {
00022         std::map<std::string, Element>::const_iterator ptr = elements_.find(name);
00023         if (ptr == elements_.end()) {
00024             return defaultValue;
00025         }
00026         if (ptr->second.et_ != et_Integer) {
00027             EXCEPTION_RAISE("ParameterTypeError", "Parameter '" + name + "' is not an integer");
00028         }
00029         return ptr->second.intval_;
00030     }

00062     const std::string& ParameterSet::getString(const std::string& name) const {
00063         std::map<std::string, Element>::const_iterator ptr = elements_.find(name);
00064         if (ptr == elements_.end()) {
00065             EXCEPTION_RAISE("ParameterNotFound", "String parameter '" + name + "' not found");
00066         }
00067         if (ptr->second.et_ != et_String) {
00068             EXCEPTION_RAISE("ParameterTypeError", "Parameter '" + name + "' is not a string");
00069         }
00070         return ptr->second.strval_;
00071     }
